QuestData.Title: Forbidden Practices
QuestData.Description: You come at a good time, $p. I have need of a weapon such as yourself.$b$bYazma's spies say dere are blood cultists in our ranks. King Rastakhan has charged me with tracking down any trolls guilty of practicing blood magic and purging dem.$b$bTake dis totem, route out those with de stench of blood magic, and cleanse dem from dis holy place.$b$bWhen you are done, tell dat lazy Hexlord Raal to get off his perch and help keep dis place secure.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find and slay $1oa Crimson Cultists in the Terrace of the Chosen.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Hexlord Raal in Terrace of the Chosen.
